'''Eugenie''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in [[Court of Fontaine: Vasari Passage]], [[Fontaine]].

Following a certain dialogue branch for the first time gives the player four [[Valberry|Valberries]].

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Eugenie:''' Would you like to see some fresh fruit?
:{{DIcon|Shop}} Lemme have a look.
::'''Eugenie:''' Each one of my veggies and fruits is filled with the spirit of water, so feel free to take your pick!
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Adventure Challenge
:;(Opens [[Genius_Invokation_TCG/Stage/Eugenie/Try_Some_Fruit!|Genius Invokation TCG match interface]])
:;(If the player loses the match)
:::'''Eugenie:''' Fresh decks are rarer than Wolfhooks, so they're difficult, huh?
:;(If the player wins the match)
:::'''Eugenie:''' What the heck! You play like an Ajilenakh Nut... I have no idea how to deal with that!
:{{DIcon}} And you are...
::'''Eugenie:''' Hello there! I'm the owner of this stall.
::'''Eugenie:''' My apologies for disturbing you with my hollering. Please understand &mdash; and don't mind me if a few extras make it into your bag, should you make a purchase. Hehe.
::{{DIcon|Reward}} Really?
::'''Eugenie:''' Yes! This batch of fruits just arrived this morning from Mondstadt. They are really sweet! Feel free to try some! If it's delicious, please come again!
:;(Obtain {{Item|Valberry|x=4}})
:{{DIcon}} About the fruits and vegetables...
::'''Eugenie:''' We produce lots of Bulle Fruit locally, but with our advanced water routes, we can import many fruits from outside as well &mdash; they'll just cost a little extra.
::'''Eugenie:''' But don't you fret. I, Eugenie, will commit no fraudulent act. Every fruit you buy is one hundred percent delicious. Not a single bad apple amongst them!
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Eugenie:''' come back again if you've the time. I'll have our best waiting for you when you do.
{{Dialogue End}}
